entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who receives gifts from Hagrid and his aunt and uncle.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who sends Harry a wooden flute as a gift.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is fascinated by the fifty-pence piece and receives gifts from his mother.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who sends him a Christmas present with his wife Aunt Petunia.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who sends him a Christmas present with her husband Uncle Vernon.

relationships.description: Hagrid sent Harry a wooden flute as a gift.
Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia sent Harry a Christmas present.
Ron's mother, Mrs. Weasley, sent Harry a Weasley jumper and home-made fudge.
